before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"4o2ng","text":"Make sure you have the right combination of secondary and primary antibodies with regards to the host species and the fluorophore.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"d15gk","text":"This protocol describes the steps for performing fluorescence immunohistochemistry on fixed-frozen pancreatic tissue sections. It is suitable for pancreatic tissue isolated from rats and mice at postnatal to adult stages. We routinely apply this protocol to quantify total and proliferating or apoptotic beta-, alpha- and delta-cells. Briefly, pancreata are fixed in 4% paraformaldehyde solution and cryoprotected overnight in 30% sucrose. Tissue are then embedded, frozen, sectioned and mounted on slides. Antigen retrieval is performed using sodium citrate buffer prior to immunostaining. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"1l45k","text":"The slides should not be allowed to dry during the staining steps. Drying out will cause nonspecific antibody binding and therefore high background staining.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
manuscript_citation: Glucose and fatty acids synergistically and reversibly promote beta cell proliferation in rats. Moullé VS, Vivot K, Tremblay C, Zarrouki B, Ghislain J, Poitout V. Diabetologia. 2017 May;60(5):879-888. doi: 10.1007/s00125-016-4197-8. Epub 2017 Jan 11. PMID: 28078385. Epidermal growth factor receptor signaling promotes pancreatic β-cell proliferation in response to nutrient excess in rats through mTOR and FOXM1. Zarrouki B, Benterki I, Fontés G, Peyot ML, Seda O, Prentki M, Poitout V. Diabetes. 2014 Mar;63(3):982-93. doi: 10.2337/db13-0425. Epub 2013 Nov 5. PMID: 24194502.

{"blocks":[{"key":"f77g5","text":"Blocking","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2eoji","text":"Dry the slides and outline the tissue with a hydrophobic barrier pen. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1hcai","text":"Place the slides with the tissue facing up in an humidified chamber and add a sufficient volume of blocking solution (  Triton,   BSA plus   normal donkey serum in PBS). Use between  -  depending on the size of the tissue. {"blocks":[{"key":"flk7d","text":"Primary antibody staining","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"76f5k","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"77d8b","text":"Remove the blocking solution and replace with  -  antibody mix diluted in blocking solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":46,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":48,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"80sfd","text":"Incubate in the humidified chamber    at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":35,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":41,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6df9f","text":"At no time should the slides be allowed to dry. {"blocks":[{"key":"792v4","text":"Secondary antibody staining ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3e3jl","text":"The following morning decant the primary antibody mixture and wash the slides three times in PBS for  using a slide holder and well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":100,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fe93i","text":"Return slides to the humidified chamber and incubate with the secondary antibody diluted in blocking solution for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":114,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":119,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1ekb3","text":"Remove the antibody mixture and wash three times   in PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"D615DD90AAC111ECAE31E9E7A8572732","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"E0FC6490AAC111ECAE31E9E7A8572732","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E6DC73A0AAC111ECAE31E9E7A8572732","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"40","unit":32}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"EB125520AAC111ECAE31E9E7A8572732","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5k4kc","text":"Place the mounted slides in a cardboard slide tray holder in the dark until ready to acquire the images with a fluorescent microscope.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"12B19CD0AAC211ECAE31E9E7A8572732","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"177629C0AAC211ECAE31E9E7A8572732","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"1C03C830AAC211ECAE31E9E7A8572732","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"1FE918B0AAC211ECAE31E9E7A8572732","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"40","unit":32}},"4":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"2507FAA0AAC211ECAE31E9E7A8572732","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
